headline: Is Rising European Defense Demand and Dividend Growth Shaping Northrop Grumman’s (NOC) Investment Appeal?
summary: On November 19, 2025, Northrop Grumman’s board of directors declared a quarterly dividend of US$2.31 per share, payable on December 17, 2025, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on December 1, 2025. A recent agreement between MBDA in Germany and Northrop Grumman aims to bolster Germany’s air and missile defense capabilities, reflecting a focus on international growth via strategic partnerships. We’ll explore how expectations for increased European defense demand may reshape...
